topics.body:
We drink to our youth, to days come and gone
For the age of the Dragons is newly begun
We'll drive out the Dovah from the land that we own
With blood and our steel we shall take back our home

All hail the legendary Dovahkiin
In your great honor, we'll drink and we'll sing
We're the children of Skyrim and we fight all our lives
When Sovngarde beckons everyone of us dies

For this land is ours,
We shall see it quite clean
From the scourge that has sullied
Our hopes and our dreams

All hail the legendary Dovahkiin
In your great honor, we'll drink and we'll sing
We're the children of Skyrim and we fight all our lives
When Sovngarde beckons everyone of us dies

OKAY. MAJOR SPOILER FOR STEEL BALL RUN AHEAD.
[spoiler]During the course of the Steel Ball Run race Johnny and Gyro come across these dead body parts. These "Corpse Parts" are what give Gyro and Johnny their Stands. It's only until later we learn that the corpse in question is JESUS MOTHERFUCKING CHRIST HIMSELF. I AM NOT MAKING THIS UP. JESUS WAS THE FIRST STAND USER![/spoiler]
